rukus.text: And We indeed gave the book to Musa, so do not be in doubt about his receiving it, and We made it a guide for the children of Israel
And when they were patient and they had certainty in Our signs, We made from among them leaders who guided by Our command
Your Fosterer will certainly decide between them on the day of resurrection, concerning that wherein they used to differ
I s it not (enough) for their guidance: How many of the generations before them did We destroy, in whose dwelling places they walk? Certainly there are signs in that. Will they not then hear
Did they not see that We drive the water to the barren earth, then We bring out vegetation from it, from which their cattle and they themselves eat, will they not then see
And they say, “When will this judgment be if you are truthful?”
Say, “On the day of judgment, the believing of those who had not believed (earlier) will not benefit them, and they will not be given time (for amendment).”
So keep away from them and wait, they (too) are certainly waiting
